services.choose-resources-can-perform-this-servic: Choose resource can perform this service
services.guide-content:
Processing Time

This is non resource spending Service time (eg: machine support service lead time)
During this idle time, this resource(staff) can be accepted another Booking for other Client

Finishing Time

This is Service Closing time after Processing time.

Total Client lead-time construct with Estimated → Processing → Finishing
This composition built a total client service time with idle(processing) and Finishing time.


※ Total Service Lead-Time : Estimated time + Processing Time + Finishing Time.

user-accounts.title: User Accounts
user-accounts.create-info: You can create a total of 00 user IDs. (Inactive IDs are not counted.)
user-accounts.info:
※ The ID can not be changed or deleted (Treat as inactive when not in use).

※ Do not use passwords similar to personal information and ID that are easy to guess, such as birthdays and phone numbers.

※ User access

* Owner access : All functions are available.

* Manager access : User management, User information edit, etc. are limited.

You can only view recent sales and expenditure history.

* Staff access : Only basic functions such as client registration/inquiry and sales history input are provided.
user-accounts.password-info:
※ English + Numbers + Special Symbols : 8~9digits

※ English + Numbers + Special Symbols(option) : 10~20digits

payments.title: Payment
payments.info1:
※ If you pay by Virtual Account / Credit Card / Real-time bank transfer, you will not receive a tax invoice.
You can print your credit card sales slip or cash receipt (proof of expenditure) and use it as a tax invoice.

virtual-account.info1:
※ Virtual Account
- Single-use deposit account, Upon completion of the deposit, the Netmoney charge / Expiry Date Extensionwill be immediately done.
virtual-account.info2:
※ Virtual Account Progress Guide
- When you make the payment, the account number to be deposited will be issued.
- Please make a bank transfer to internet banking or CD / ATM machine (cash machine).
(Please note: CD / ATM equipment must be transferred using bankbook or card (no cash deposit available))
- Once the deposit is completed, the system will process it automatically (instantly Netmoney charged)
- Deposits can only be made with the correct amount. (Depositors may be different.)
- Deposit time is 24 hours (please get a new virtual account number when you make a deposit later)
- Unable to transfer cash card or alliance card from stock firm
- Charge bank fees and booking transfer is not allowed
virtual-account.info3:
※ If you pay by Virtual Account / Credit Card / Real-time bank transfer, you will not receive a tax invoice.
You can print your credit card sales slip or cash receipt (proof of expenditure) and use it as a tax invoice.
virtual-account.info4: ■ When you make the deposit to below virtual account, It will be processed automatically.(Virtual Account is vaild only 24 hours)

depositless-payments.info:
※ Depositless payment may take some time because the payment is processed after the administrator confirms the payment during client center operation hours.
(Weekdays 09:00am ~ 06:30pm / Saturday 09:30am ~ 03:00pm)
depositless-payments.title: ■ Depositless payment Notification
depositless-payments.mobile-phone-number-info: * After confirmation of payment, a completed text message will be sent to the corresponding number.
depositless-payments.info2: ※ If you want immediate Netmoney charge / Expiry Date Extension,Please use Depositless payment(Virtual Account)

payment-result.info: ※ Please make a deposit to the following account and we will process your payment after confirming your payment. (Deposit processing time : Weekday AM 09:00 ~ PM 06:30 / Sat. AM 09:30 ~ PM 03:00 If you want to process immediately outside the deposit processing time, please use the card payment and real time account transfer.)

variable-data.balance-add-example-info: 예) 홍길동님의 '200000 Balance Card'에 적립된 선불액은 200000원이고, 사용가능한 선불잔액은 200000원일 경우
variable-data.balance-deduction-example-info: 예) 홍길동님의 '200000 Balance Card'에서 오늘 사용한 선불액은 5만원이고 남은 선불액은 150000원일 경우
variable-data.prepaid-service-quantity-add-example-inf: 예) 홍길동님이 Cut 10 Ticket을 구매했고, 사용가능한 티켓 횟수가 10회일 경우
variable-data.prepaid-service-quantity-deduction-examp: 예) 홍길동님이 'Cut'을 차감하고 남은 티켓 횟수가 10회일 경우
variable-data.prepaid-service-expiry-date-reminder-exa: 예) 홍길동님의 Cut 10 Ticket 중 남은횟수는 10회이고, 만료일이 2020년 12월 31일인 경우
variable-data.prepaid-card-expiry-date-reminder-exampl: 예) 홍길동님의 '200000 Balance Card'의 선불잔액이 200000원이고, 만료일이 2020년 12월 31일인 경우
variable-data.booking-reminder-example-info: Ex) If Julian booked on October 5th at 10:30 am
variable-data.booking-cancel-example-info: Ex) If Julian canceled the booking made on October 5th at 10:30 am
